item.title: VMware Harbor Registry
item.description: This post will briefly go through how to deploy (using Helm), configure and use VMware Harbor registry in Kubernetes. Quick introduction to Harbor Harbor is an open source registry that secures artifacts with policies and role-based access control, ensures images are scanned and free from vulnerabilities, and signs images as trusted. Harbor, a CNCF Graduated project, delivers compliance, performance, and interoperability to help you consistently and securely manage artifacts across cloud native compute platforms like Kubernetes and Docker.
